name: Asia Pacific Wire & Cable Corporation Limited
description: Asia Pacific Wire & Cable Corporation Limited (APWC) is a leading manufacturer and supplier of wire and cable products in the Asia Pacific region. Established in 1997, the company focuses on delivering high-quality electrical and communication cables for various industries, including telecommunications, energy, and construction. With its headquarters in Taipei, Taiwan, APWC operates manufacturing facilities in several countries, enabling it to serve a global customer base. The company specializes in producing a wide range of products, such as copper and aluminum cables, fiber optic cables, and specialty wire products. APWC is committed to innovation and quality, utilizing advanced manufacturing technologies to ensure that its products meet international standards. The company has established a strong reputation for reliability and customer service, making it a preferred partner for many clients in the wire and cable sector. In addition to its manufacturing capabilities, APWC invests in research and development to enhance its product offerings and maintain a competitive edge in the market. With a focus on sustainability and environmental responsibility, APWC actively works to reduce its carbon footprint and promote eco-friendly practices throughout its operations.
